item.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Cluster006 - filerz 732, 733, 736, 747, 757, 758, 763, 764 and 778
item.description:
Oct 30, 13:28 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 30/10/2023 09:30 UTC
End time : 30/10/2023 10:50 UTC
Service impact : Slowness was observed on some hosted websites on filerz 732, 733, 736, 747, 757, 758, 763, 764 and 778
Root cause : Overload on a storage equipment
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 30, 12:48 UTC
Update - Our technical teams fixed the issue for filerz 732, 733, 736, 747, 757, 758, 763 and 778 and are still working on filerz764.

Oct 30, 10:33 UTC
Identified - Our teams are currently implementing a fix to resolve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Oct 30, 09:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 30/10/2023 09:30 UTC
Service impact : slowness on some hosted websites on filerz 732, 733, 736, 747, 757, 763, and 764.
Ongoing actions : Investigating Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
